description:
dark wood with vertical grain; PL side of stock: silver eagle; wood ornately carved; PR side of stock: brass patch box with silver eagle; brass butt and trigger housing; engraved on trigger plate: "T ETLAND & CO" engraved on top: "RJ Harn 1999". 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: Curly maple, iron, steel, brass, silver
title: North Carolina-style (Salem, c. 1820) Flintlock Longrifle
